abstract: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church in Charleston, SC, where nine people were shot to death, is among most oldest, storied black congregations in South; massacre of churchgoers, including pastor Clementa C Pinckney, had especially deep impact in genteel city, proud of its history but still troubled and torn by race and class.
lead_paragraph: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church, where nine people were killed in Wednesday’s shooting, is one of the oldest black churches in the South.

headline.main: Killings Add Painful Page to Storied History of Charleston Church
headline.print_headline: Scene of Carnage Has Long History of Pain, Pride and Dignity

snippet: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church, where nine people were killed in Wednesday’s shooting, is one of the oldest black churches in the South.

keywords.value: Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Charleston, SC)
